allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$file = ''C:\github\couch-sitter\index.html''
$content = Get-Content $file -Raw

# Remove the entire tenant selection dialog
$content = $content -replace ''(?s)\s*<!-- Tenant Selection Dialog -->.*?</dialog>\s*'', ''''

# Remove x-show attributes from nav and main
$content = $content -replace ''x-show=""!showTenantSelection""'', ''''

Set-Content -Path $file -Value $content -Encoding UTF8
Write-Host ''Done''
")
